content: Inside here, you'll find the old man who gave you the gourd at the start of the game and an Awaken Wine Worm to the left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Inside here, you'll find the old man who gave you the gourd at the start of the game and an Awaken Wine Worm to the left.
